CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, pg. 22 reads: "Courier's Pittsburgh Home Service Fair...6. FINE EXHIBITS - Philip Morris' assistant sales promotion manager, Herbert H. Wright, who has been responsible for the Philip Morris exhibit in each of the Courier's thirteen fairs...All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Herbert H. Wright standing in Philip Morris booth during the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Ammon Center
